function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of fake news and misinformation on social media during the pandemic leading to increased anxiety and panic.","Impact":"Heightened anxiety and panic among the population, hindering pandemic control efforts.","Mitigation":"Promotion of awareness regarding original sources of information and fact-checking, dissemination of verified information through official channels.","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, AI algorithms for identifying fake news, social media monitoring and reporting tools.","People":"General public, social media users","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, social media platforms"},{"Description":"Increased impact of decision-making based on social media discussions, leading to potential resistance to official decisions.","Impact":"Resistance to official decisions, hindering effective pandemic management and control.","Mitigation":"Establishment of two-way dialogue between decision-makers and the public, provision of accurate information to the public through interactive channels.","Technologies":"Online forums, interactive social media platforms, decision-making support software.","People":"Decision-makers, public officials, social media users","Owner":"Government, public organizations, decision-making authorities"},{"Description":"Motivated by collectivist interests, social media use during the pandemic differs from normal times, focusing on survival and shared concerns.","Impact":"Shift from individual interest to collective interest, affecting content creation and engagement on social media.","Mitigation":"Creation of engaging content promoting collective well-being, dissemination of vital and real data related to the pandemic, promotion of solidarity and shared concerns.","Technologies":"Social media content management tools, data visualization software, sentiment analysis tools.","People":"Social media content developers, public health organizations, general public","Owner":"Content creators, public health organizations, social media platforms"}]}
